Text:
Not bad; unfortunately (and contrary to the descriptions of this release on on various torrent blogs) at the 50-something minute mark, the audio switches from line to the live track recorded in the cinema--coughing, laughter, talking etc etc. 

It's a shame because it's better than the average  TS up until then...but that ruins it for me. 

The only reason I downloaded this release is because various sources said that FLOJO had fixed that audio problem and it was an all-line audio: it's not. Just sayin'...be warned.
